entry.string: The XLink module is a utility module that allows you to establish relationships between module items and some independent identifier, e.g. for shortcut URLs or foreign key look-ups with external databases. Enable its hooks for any module where you want to use it...
entry.translation: Zee XLeenk mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole-a thet elloos yuoo tu istebleesh releshunsheeps betveee mudoole-a items und sume-a independent identeeffier, i.g. fur shurtcoot URLs oor fureeegn key luuk-ups veet ixternel detebeses. Ineble-a its huuks fur uny mudoole-a vhere-a yuoo vunt tu use-a it. Um de hur de hur de hur...

entry.string:
The independent identifier can be composed of a base name (optional) and an identifier. Examples : 200309121551.xyz, kbase 123, products "This Nice Product", ...

For each hooked module, specify the acceptable base names for the items you want to reference.

When you declare a base name as alias for short URLs, you can use index.php/kbase/123 instead of index.php/xlink/kbase/123
entry.translation:
Zee independent identeeffier cun be-a cumpused ooff a bese-a neme-a (oopshunel) und un identeeffier. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Ixemples : 200309121551.xyz, kbese-a 123, prudoocts "Thees Neece-a Prudooct", ...

Fur iech huuked mudoole-a, speceeffy zee eccepteble-a bese-a nemes fur zee items yuoo vunt tu refference-a.

Vhee yuoo declere-a a bese-a neme-a es eleees fur shurt URLs, yuoo cun use-a index.php/kbese-a/123 insteed ooff index.php/xleenk/kbese-a/123
